manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dual Turbine Ultrasonic Deep Cleaning for Sinks Dorms Travel The Dpofirs 5V USB Mini Washing Machine is a portable and compact home washer designed for convenient and easy use. It features a dual turbine design that provides twice the washing power, making the cleaning process quick and efficient. The ultrasonic cleaning technology uses premium frequency vibration cavitation to accelerate the dispersion and emulsification of liquid and dirt, achieving deep and thorough cleaning while producing low noise. The machine offers four adjustable modes, including automatic cycle cleaning, automatic forward and reverse rotation, ultrasonic vibration cleaning, and bubble cleaning. These modes can be easily switched using the built-in remote control. The mini washing machine can be used in any bucket, washbasin, or hand washing table to wash clothes. It automatically stops after running for 30 minutes. This product is made using ABS material and has an input voltage of 5V and output voltage of 12V. It weighs approximately 363g, making it easy to carry around for home, dorm, and travel use. Note that customers need to provide their own plugs, but some USB ports can also be used directly.

Washing Machines Take up Space: One solution is to consider purchasing a compact or portable washing machine that can be stored away easily when not in use. Another option is to utilize a laundry service or communal laundry room in your building or neighborhood. Hand Wash for Intimate Clothing: Hand washing is a gentle way to clean delicate clothing items such as lingerie. Fill a container with lukewarm water and a small amount of gentle detergent, then gently agitate and rinse the garment until it's clean. Hang or lay it flat to dry. Dirty Communal Washing Machine: Wash the washing machine first with hot water and detergent, then run a cycle with vinegar or another cleaning agent to disinfect the machine. Try to coordinate with other residents to schedule cleaning times or consider investing in a personal laundry machine. No Washing Machine in Small Amount: Pick up a few basics, such as a clothesline, detergent, and a basin or bucket, and handwash your clothes when needed. You can also visit a laundromat or utilize a laundry service. Don't Want to Wash on Business Trip: Choose clothing items that can be worn more than once or consider packing disposable clothing items. Utilize a laundry service or drop off your clothing at a nearby laundromat. Clothes Can't Be Machine Washed: Hand wash your clothing items or consider sending them to a professional dry cleaner. Always check labels and care instructions before cleaning any garment.

3 Steps to Work First, attach the washing machine to a bucket or washbasin using the suction cups provided. Make sure it is secure and stable. Add the appropriate amount of washing liquid, depending on your laundry load size and the type of fabric you are washing. Follow the instructions on the detergent packaging to determine the correct amount. Turn on the washing machine using the remote control, and select the appropriate cleaning mode. The machine will run for 30 minutes before automatically turning off. When the cycle is complete, remove your clothes from the bucket or washbasin and rinse as needed.

More Details Power Failure Pretection The mini washing machine has a power protection function that automatically shuts off the machine when there is a power failure. This helps to prevent any damage to the machine or potential hazards. 4 Cleaning Modes The washing machine has four cleaning modes - automatic cycle cleaning, automatic forward and reverse rotation, ultrasonic vibration cleaning, and bubble cleaning. This allows the user to choose the best mode for their specific cleaning needs, ensuring a thorough and efficient wash every time. Compact and Portable The mini washing machine is designed to be small and lightweight, making it easy to carry and store. It can be used in a variety of settings, such as at home, in a dorm, or during travel. Its compact size also means it doesn't take up much space and is easy to move around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had high hopes for this little device, because both sides rotate and because it was more expensive than many others. I hoped it would actually clean something. However, it barely moves around the soapy water. Disappointed. Returning.
